mapper.select: SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, ow.order_wasted_phone AS orderWastedPhone, ow.order_wasted_address AS orderWastedAddress, ow.order_wasted_amount AS orderWastedAmount, ow.order_wasted_date AS orderWastedDate, owd.order_wasted_delivery_status as orderWastedDeliveryStatus FROM order_wasted_delivery owd INNER JOIN company_info ci ON owd.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx INNER JOIN order_wasted ow ON ow.order_wasted_idx = owd.order_wasted_idx WHERE ow.username = #{userId};

SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, ow.order_wasted_phone AS orderWastedPhone, ow.order_wasted_address AS orderWastedAddress, ow.order_wasted_amount AS orderWastedAmount, ow.order_wasted_date AS orderWastedDate, COALESCE(owc.order_wasted_confirm_status , '대기중') AS orderWastedConfirmStatus FROM company_info ci INNER JOIN order_wasted ow ON ci.company_info_idx = ow.company_info_idx LEFT JOIN order_wasted_confirm owc ON ow.order_wasted_idx = owc.order_wasted_idx WHERE ci.username = #{userId};

SELECT cu.company_unit_idx as companyUnitIdx, ci.company_info_idx as companyInfoIdx, cc.company_contract_idx as companyContractIdx FROM company_info ci INNER JOIN company_contract cc ON ci.company_info_idx = cc.company_info_idx INNER JOIN company_unit cu ON ci.company_idx = cu.company_idx WHERE ci.username = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_wasted( company_contract_idx, username, company_info_idx, inventory_idx, order_wasted_amount, company_unit_idx, order_wasted_sub_total, ORDER_wasted_phone, order_wasted_content, order_wasted_address, order_wasted_date )values(#{companyContractIdx},#{userId},#{companyInfoIdx},3,#{amount},#{companyUnitIdx},1000,#{phone},#{message},#{address},now());
